--------------------
Text: Baron Brownlow, of Belton in the County of Lincoln, is a title in the Peerage of Great Britain.
Triplets:<Baron Brownlow
1:
--------------------
Text: Baron Brownlow:  It was created in 1776 for Sir Brownlow Cust, 4th Baronet.

Triplets:<Baron Brownlow
4:
--------------------
<Text: Baron Brownlow:  He was succeeded by his grandson, the second Baronet.>
Triplets:<Baron Brownlow
5:
--------------------
Text: Baron Brownlow:  He married Anne Brownlow, daughter of Sir William Brownlow, 4th Baronet, of Humby and sister and sole heiress of John Brownlow, 1st Viscount Tyrconnel (and 5th Baronet, of Humby).
Triplets:<Baron Brownlow
